knimeNode.name: Twitter Trends
knimeNode.shortDescription: Returns Twitter Trends data via Twitter API

fullDescription.intro: This node uses Twitter API Connector to connect to Twitter API to pull Trends data. It will first make a call to trends/available to download a list of available cities/countries and populated a the Place drop down. Select a Place and it will then make a call to trends/place to pull down Twitter Trends data for that specifc city or country.
fullDescription.option: This is a drop down of available places with Twitter Trends data. This list is updated on the fly.
Setting this equal to hashtags will remove all hashtags from the trends list.

ports.outPort: Twitter Trends data in table form
